@{557058:90bc87b0-2886-4377-a17c-3a6629a697ff} , on 6c16188 I made sure that relative paths from Unix work on Windows and vice-versa. There's a TODO left for supporting absolute paths interchangeably, but I think that using an absolute path from another machine is not a good idea, let alone from another operating system.

If the tests pass on Windows and you agree with the latest changes, feel free to merge.
